item.title: Setting Alias in WSL
item.description: For Bash: Open the .bashrc file in your home directory using a text editor: nano ~/.bashrc Add the following line at the end of the file: alias k=kubectl Save the file and exit the editor: Press Ctrl + O to save. Press Enter to confirm. Press Ctrl + X to exit. Apply the changes by sourcing the .bashrc file: source ~/.bashrc For Zsh: Open the .zshrc file in your home directory using a text editor:
